metadata.dc:title: Heparinoterapia contínua en la trombosis venosa profunda y su control con los tiempos de Howel y de trombina. Estudio prospectivo.
[Continuous heparin therapy in deep venous thrombosis and its monitoring with the Howel and thrombin times. Prospective study].
